title: 376 - On the Big Island with Kyle and Simon
description:
We recorded this one during a pig hunting trip. Our conversation ranges far and wide, to put it mildly. Check out Simon's podcast, Nervous Rex, and The Kyle Thiermann Show.

This episode is sponsored by SC Medicinals.

Find me on Instagram or Twitter.

Please consider supporting this podcast on Patreon.

This Amazon affiliate link kicks a few bucks back my way.


Music: “Brightside of the Sun,” by Basin and Range; “Waiting for My Real Life to Begin,” by Colin Hay; “Smoke Alarm,” by Carsie Blanton.



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
